data.name: no baners.e.mail
data.description: Blocking all ads in old e.mail.ru
data.css: @-moz-document domain("e.mail.ru"){#LEGO #leftcol-banners,#LEGO .b-rb,#preload_banner,[id*=b-5],[class*=et__b]{display:none!important;}/*В опере возможно работает с отключением расширения "Блокировка рекламы Opera". Источник "RUS: RU AdList"*/}

data.name: lesJoiesDuCodeWide
data.description:
"Les joies du code" is a website where I can spend a lot of time but I think it is not very beautiful.
This is not a full redesign but something that can help people not going away before viewing the great content!
